title: Storage Units
guide:
### Decimal vs Binary
Sales vs Real Windows size.

| Unit | Decimal (Sales) | Binary (OS) | Loss |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **1 KB** | 1,000 | 1,024 | 2.4% |
| **1 GB** | 10^9 | 2^30 | ~7% |
| **1 TB** | 10^12 | 2^40 | ~10% |
